name: bobores
title: Bob's Ores mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod.

Adds some useful ores, designed for use by Bob's Metals, Chemicals and Intermediates mod (MCI).
All ores are disabled by default, MCI will turn on the minimum required ores.
Other mods may make use of these ores.

Ores include, Bauxite(Aluminium), Cobalt, Gems, Gold, Galena(Lead), Nickel, Quartz(Glass, Silicon), Rutile(Titanium), Silver, Sulfur, Thorium, Tin, Tungsten and Zinc.
Also includes Ground water and Lithia water mining fluid nodes, which function similar to Oil.
